title: "Amazon announces the signing of a contract with the British secret service around artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "Amazon has won a contract, via its AWS Cloud platform, estimated at between 500 million and one billion pounds (600 million to 1.2 billion euros) with the British secret services, which want to consolidate all their sensitive data."
